mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fp_user (id, user_id, password, nickname, email, gender, birth, phone) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId},#{password},#{nickname},#{email},#{gender},#{birth},#{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT (A.id) AS id, (A.user_id) AS userId, (A.password) AS password, (A.nickname) AS nickname, (A.email) AS email, (A.gender) AS gender, (A.birth) AS birth, (A.phone) AS phone, (A.created_at) AS createdAt FROM fp_user A WHERE A.user_id = #{userId} AND A.password = #{password}
